en-GB.summary: Learn fun facts about edx courses
examplePhrases: Alexa tell edx courses to give me a fact
Alexa tell edx courses to tell me trivia
en-GB.name: NeilDixitProject
en-GB.description:
Ask for exs cs50 Facts, and learn about what really matters.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch edx courses" or "Alexa, open edx courses" to get a fact".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: please launch skill using phrase 'edx courses' and use 'stop' or 'cancel' to stop it.
